verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>; For it is good<WH2896> to sing praises<WH2167> unto our God<WH430>; For it is pleasant<WH5273>, and praise<WH8416> is comely<WH5000>.
Jehovah <WH3068> doth build up<WH1129> Jerusalem<WH3389>; He gathereth together<WH3664> the outcasts<WH1760> of Israel<WH3478>.
He healeth<WH7495> the broken<WH7665> in heart<WH3820>, And bindeth up<WH2280> their wounds<WH6094>.
He counteth<WH4487> the number<WH4557> of the stars<WH3556>; He calleth<WH7121> them all by their names<WH8034>.
Great <WH1419> is our Lord<WH113>, and mighty<WH7227> in power<WH3581>; His understanding<WH8394> is infinite<WH4557>.
Jehovah <WH3068> upholdeth<WH5749> the meek<WH6035>: He bringeth<WH8213> the wicked<WH7563> down<WH8213> to the ground<WH776>.
Sing <WH6030> unto Jehovah<WH3068> with thanksgiving<WH8426>; Sing praises<WH2167> upon the harp<WH3658> unto our God<WH430>,
Who covereth<WH3680> the heavens<WH8064> with clouds<WH5645>, Who prepareth<WH3559> rain<WH4306> for the earth<WH776>, Who maketh grass<WH2682> to grow<WH6779> upon the mountains<WH2022>.
He giveth<WH5414> to the beast<WH929> his food<WH3899>, And to the young<WH1121> ravens<WH6158> which cry<WH7121>.
He delighteth<WH2654> not in the strength<WH1369> of the horse<WH5483>: He taketh no pleasure<WH7521> in the legs<WH7785> of a man<WH376>.
Jehovah <WH3068> taketh pleasure<WH7521> in them that fear<WH3373> him<WH3176>, In those that hope in his lovingkindness<WH2617>.
Praise <WH7623> Jehovah<WH3068>, O Jerusalem<WH3389>; Praise<WH1984> thy God<WH430>, O Zion<WH6726>.
For he hath strengthened<WH2388> the bars<WH1280> of thy gates<WH8179>; He hath blessed<WH1288> thy children<WH1121> within thee<WH7130>.
He maketh<WH7760> peace<WH7965> in thy borders<WH1366>; He filleth<WH7646> thee with the finest<WH2459> of the wheat<WH2406>.
He sendeth out<WH7971> his commandment<WH565> upon earth<WH776>; His word<WH1697> runneth<WH7323> very swiftly<WH4120>.
He giveth<WH5414> snow<WH7950> like wool<WH6785>; He scattereth<WH6340> the hoar-frost<WH3713> like ashes<WH665>.
He casteth forth<WH7993> his ice<WH7140> like morsels<WH6595>: Who can stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> his cold<WH7135>?
He sendeth out<WH7971> his word<WH1697>, and melteth<WH4529> them<WH7307>: He causeth his wind to blow<WH5380>, and the waters<WH4325> flow<WH5140>.
He showeth<WH5046> his word<WH1697> unto Jacob<WH3290>, His statutes<WH2706> and his ordinances<WH4941> unto Israel<WH3478>.
He hath not dealt<WH6213> so with any nation<WH1471>; And as for his ordinances<WH4941>, they have not known<WH3045> them<WH1984>. Praise ye Jehovah<WH3050>.
